# Ressources

```{r}
#| label: init_python

library('reticulate')

```


# Managing python installation
```{r}
#| eval: false
library('reticulate')
py_discover_config()
py_config()
conda_list()

conda_version()
configure_environment()
conda_create('sbloggel')


conda_install('sbloggel', 'pandas')
miniconda_update()
use_condaenv('sbloggel')
conda_install('sbloggel', 'plotly')
use_condaenv('base')
```
